effect: Summons Grassy Terrain for 5 turns upon entering battle. Grassy Terrain boosts Grass-type moves by 30% (50% in Gen 8+), halves Earthquake, Bulldoze, and Magnitude damage, and restores 1/16 HP to grounded Pokémon each turn.
notes: Terrain overrides other terrains. Does not affect airborne Pokémon like those with Levitate or Flying-type.
